title: Heart of the Streets
description: Heart of the Streets is a tale of love and loyalty that is centered around the lives of Corinne and Jabari. Corinne is running from the pain of her past but she can't seem to run fast enough. Jabari thought he had it all but even with everything, something is still missing. Follow Corinne and Jabari through the streets of Atlanta as she offers him a loyalty he's never had and he showers her in a love she never knew existed!
author: Chenae Glaze
